biblStruct.note: The monograph of the Doctor of Historical Sciences, Archimandrite Damaskin (Orlovsky) contains a detailed description of the life and work of the Holy Martyr Pimen (Belolikov), the Orthodox Urmian Mission and all its leaders. According to the author, the book is devoted to «the problems of Christians and the fate of that part of the Syrian people who, due to political conditions, were rejected from the Orthodox local churches». A significant place in the publication is given to studies of international relations, the basis of the documents of which were the materials of the Archive of Foreign policy of the Russian Empire (AVPRI).
